definition: to a meager degree or in a meager manner, deficient in amount or quality or extent
details:
adverb
- to a meager degree or in a meager manner
= example: to a meager degree or in a meager manner
= synonyms: sparingly, slenderly, meagrely
adjective
- deficient in amount or quality or extent
= synonyms: meager, meagre, stingy, scrimpy
